src:
英超-罗伯逊破门马内94分钟绝杀！ 利物浦2-1逆转

04 Nov 2019, 02:38

【网易体育3日讯】（英国当地时间11月2日下午15时），2019-2020赛季英超联赛第11轮继续进行，利物浦做客挑战阿斯顿维拉。上半时比赛，第21分钟，特雷泽盖利用定位球破门打破僵局，第28分钟，菲尔米诺进球因越位被判无效。下半场比赛，第86分钟，罗伯逊头球攻门将比分扳平，马内终场前绝杀，最终利物浦2-1逆转维拉。历史上，两队一共交手48次，利物浦26胜10平12负占据上风。2014到2016年间，双方交锋6次，利物浦3胜1平2负，历史交锋利物浦并不能完全碾压阿斯顿维拉。但是，两队的最近一次交锋，利物浦在2016年客场以6-0的比分大胜阿斯顿维拉，而且，那个赛季利物浦只排在英超联赛第8位，今日的利物浦非往日可比。双方出场阵容：阿斯顿维拉（4-3-3）：1-汤姆-希顿；24-吉尔伯特（69’27-埃尔默罕马迪）、22-恩格尔斯、40-明斯；18-塔格特、11-纳卡姆巴、6-道格拉斯-路易斯（72’14-霍利海恩）；7-麦金、17-特雷泽盖、9-韦斯利（86’26-柯德齐）、21-埃尔加齐。利物浦（4-3-3）：1-阿利松；66-阿诺德、6-洛夫伦、4-范戴克、26-罗伯逊；20-拉拉纳（84’8-凯塔）、14-亨德森、5-维纳尔杜姆（65’27-奥里吉）；11-萨拉赫（64’15-张伯伦）、10-马内、9-菲尔米诺。
text:
Premier League - Robertson broke the door to the 94-minute lore! Liverpool 2-1 reversal

04 Nov 2019, 02:38

[Netease Sports 3rd News] (15th local time on November 2nd in the UK), the 11th round of the 2019-2020 Premier League will continue, Liverpool will challenge Aston Villa. In the first half of the game, in the 21st minute, Trezeguet used the positioning ball to break the deadlock. In the 28th minute, Fermino's goal was invalidated due to offside. In the second half of the game, in the 86th minute, Robertson headed the goal to equalize the score, and Marne finished the game before the final, and Liverpool 2-1 reversed Vera. In history, the two teams played a total of 48 times, Liverpool 26 wins, 10 draws and 12 losses have the upper hand. Between 2014 and 2016, the two sides fought 6 times, Liverpool 3 wins, 1 draw and 2 losses, the historical confrontation Liverpool can not completely crush Aston Villa. However, the last time the two teams met, Liverpool beat Aston Villa 6-0 in 2016, and Liverpool ranked only 8th in the Premier League that season, today's Liverpool is comparable. Both sides played in the lineup: Aston Villa (4-3-3): 1-Tom-Hidden; 24-Gilbert (69'27-Elmerhamdi), 22-Engels, 40-Ming斯; 18- Tagget, 11-Nakamba, 6-Douglas-Louis (72'14-Hollyhain); 7-McGin, 17-Trezeguet, 9-Wesley (86'26 - Kodzi), 21 - Elgazi. Liverpool (4-3-3): 1-Alysson; 66-Arnold, 6-Lovron, 4-Van Dyke, 26-Robertson; 20-Lalana (84'8-Keta), 14- Henderson, 5-Vinardum (65'27-Origi); 11-Sarah (64'15- Chamberlain), 10-Marne, 9-Fermino.
